actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To establish an Emergency Malpractice Liability Insurance Commission.
short_title: Emergency Malpractice Liability Insurance Commission (EMLIC) Act

summary.text: Emergency Malpractice Liability Insurance Commission (EMLIC) Act - Establishes the Emergency Malpractice Liability Insurance Commission, whose purpose is to examine the causes of soaring medical malpractice premiums and propose a comprehensive strategy to combat the consequences. Directs the Commission to investigate the possible linkage between: (1) skyrocketing malpractice insurance premiums; (2) rising jury awards; (3) decreased accessibility and affordability of health care; and (4) a rise in the number of physicians moving, quitting, or retiring.

titles.title: Emergency Malpractice Liability Insurance Commission (EMLIC) Act
To establish an Emergency Malpractice Liability Insurance Commission.
